net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm
Interface ByteCoder

All Known Implementing Classes:
Base64Coder, GZipCoderJ2se, MultiPartCoder, MultiPartCoderWapx, StreamCoder, WrapperCoder, ZipCoderJ2se
public interface ByteCoder

An interface for transforming bytes for use with the CoderInterface. Implementations of this interface should be re-entrant, so there should be no non-static fields.

See Also:
CoderInterface, CoderBuffer
